mapper.sql: partpId, docId, name, role, createUser, operatorType, userLoginName, isShiftChange, docType
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM evt_participant a where a.role = #{role} and operatorType = #{operatorType} AND a.docId = #{docId}
mapper.delete: delete from evt_participant WHERE docId = #{docId} and role = #{role}
mapper.update: update evt_participant set docId = #{docId}, name = #{name}, role = #{role}, createUser = #{createUser}, operatorType = #{operatorType}, userLoginName = #{userLoginName}, isShiftChange = #{isShiftChange} where partpId = #{partpId}
mapper.delete: delete from evt_participant WHERE docId = #{docId} and userLoginName = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
insert into evt_participant
partpId,
docId,
name,
role,
createUser,
operatorType,
userLoginName,
isShiftChange,
docType,

mapper.update:
update evt_participant
docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operatorType = #{operatorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userLoginName = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isShiftChange = #{isShiftChange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where partpId = #{partpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update evt_participant set docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorType = #{operatorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userLoginName = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isShiftChange = #{isShiftChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where partpId = #{partpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
